Reviews.Title: Great for my son and his television
Reviews.Author: rez
Reviews.Content: Great price for a protection plan for my son's television we purchased.  It did not break the bank.  If I have to use it, I will return with any reviews positively or negatively regarding the usage of the protection

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: catz1965 "catz1965"
Reviews.Content: Haven't had to use this yet and hope that I won't as some of these things are not worth it but for the price I took a chance.

Reviews.Title: What can you say
Reviews.Author: James Newman
Reviews.Content: What can you say about getting extra protection ?  Only that I'm glad I have it and hope that I never have to use itThanks

Reviews.Title: Great protection
Reviews.Author: rockin
Reviews.Content: Great protection plan hope i never have to use it but if i do i know its protected I like that feeling

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: erdisroper1
Reviews.Content: My brother insisted we purchase the protection plan for the HDTV.  The price for the service I consider to be reasonable.

Reviews.Title: For the TV
Reviews.Author: RICARDO ROACH
Reviews.Content: We'll see as nice as TV is hope not to need it..the coverage is there. Tag looks great ..easy setup

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Awake in Seattle
Reviews.Content: I didn't receive the info immediately about the warranty but when I requested it they immediately responded and very courteous and helpful. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: TV Protection
Reviews.Author: allen may
Reviews.Content: Purchased because of price. Have not used. I am hoping that I will never use it because that means that my TV worked fine.

Reviews.Title: hard to figure out
Reviews.Author: Daniel D.
Reviews.Content: took to long to ftgure out how to receive all the info. to put togather to receive warranty . bye

Reviews.Title: Have Not Used
Reviews.Author: mp
Reviews.Content: Luckily, I have not had to use this as my TV is only a few weeks old. I bought this just to be safe. Will come back with a full review if I ever have to use my plan.

Reviews.Title: Hope it's this good
Reviews.Author: Deanne Champagne
Reviews.Content: It's hard to review this since we haven't needed to utilize it so I'm hoping that's it is worthy of a 5 star

Reviews.Title: have not had to use the service
Reviews.Author: Joe Casey
Reviews.Content: I can not rate the service because I have not had to use it as yet.  So far my contact with them has been good thru e-mails for confirmation of my purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
100% Parts and Labor Coverage
Free In-Home Service on Large Products (i.e. television, appliance)
Repair or Replacement Promise on Every Product
Contract shipped via email so there is no waiting
Repair Plans are Fully Transferable at No Additional Cost
ProductInfo.Name: 3-Year LCD-LED TV Plan ($200-250)
